TopicTitle: Can't upload picture: Image did not match required aspect ratio.

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to upload at 910x910 picture for Logo on Curse but it refuse with the error message. " Image did not match required aspect ratio" yet it is clearly has 1:1 aspect, what is wrong?

EDIT: I just noticed that no matter what ever files I select (for example text files) it gives the same error. Perhaps curse picutre upload is broken

I'm still waiting for an answer

I am sorry, completely forgot about this. The ratio is correct. My guess is it might be too large. Try resizing to 700x700. And if I forget to respond poke me at @JadedcatWylde .
